Hey, I’m Glen. Let’s build a beautiful website.

Hey, I’m Glen. Let’s build a beautiful website.

}

About Me

Thanks for stopping by. I am an enthusiastic and driven web developer looking for a role within a brilliant company. I’m excited to learn from and collaborate with experienced developers to improve my skills and take projects from concept to reality.



I focus on writing clean, maintainable and reusable HTML, CSS and Javascript. When writing Javascript, I typically use React, but am adaptable to whatever framework is required for the job. I also have backend development experience using Python & SQLite. Flask is my go-to framework for Python development but I can adapt here too.



I hope to find a role on a great team in Toronto or working remotely. Please check out my work below!

{ setActive("portfolio") } }>
); } export default Home;
